tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_sightings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    tour_guide VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sighting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    conservation_efforts TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Wildlife_Sightings (
    sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sighting_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Conservation_Efforts (
    effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    conservation_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    conservation_action TEXT NOT NULL,
    conservation_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_sightings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    species TEXT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    researcher TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
    effort_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    action TEXT,
    success BOOLEAN,
    conservationist TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE adventure_tours (
    tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    guide TEXT,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tour_groups (
  group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  group_name VARCHAR(50),
  group_leader_id INT,
  tour_start_date DATE,
  tour_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sightings (
  sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  sighting_date DATE,
  tour_group_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES wildlife_species(species_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tour_group_id) REFERENCES tour_groups(group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conservation_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE adventure_tours (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name VARCHAR(100),
    guide_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_topic VARCHAR(100),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
